bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Investigation, Analysis and Reporting of Power Circuit Breaker Failures
IEEE Draft Guide for Investigation, Analysis and Reporting of Power Circuit Breaker Failures
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.10/D1.0, Mar 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide provides practices and processes to perform, analyze, and report failure investigations of power circuit breakers.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
